named-query.name: Personage.findAll
named-query.query: select p from Personage p order by p.persName

named-query.name: Personage.findByPersName
named-query.query: select p from Personage p where p.persName = :persName

named-query.name: Clan.findAll
named-query.query: select c from Clan c order by c.clanName

named-query.name: Clan.findByClanName
named-query.query: select c from Clan c where c.clanName = :clanName

named-query.name: AttributeColumns.findAll
named-query.query: select ac from AttributeColumns ac order by ac.idattributeCol

named-query.name: AttributeColumns.findByattributeColName
named-query.query: select ac from AttributeColumns ac where ac.attributeColName = :attributeColName

named-query.name: PersAttCol.findPrimaryAttributeColumn
named-query.query: select pac from PersAttCol pac where pac.personage = :personage and pac.attColValue = "primary"

named-query.name: PersAttCol.findAllForPersonageAndAttributeColumns
named-query.query: select pac from PersAttCol pac join fetch pac.personage join fetch pac.attributeColumns
